alert.note: Alert for Mercer (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 23 at 8:42PM CST until December 24 at 9:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Illinois, Mercer County. In Iowa, Cedar, Johnson, Jones, Linn, Muscatine, Delaware, and Louisa Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions could improve from west to east tonight and portions of the advisory may be cancelled early.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
